data.actual_result: The link doesn't send and shows an infinite file progress bar instead. Only way to get rid of it is by killing the app
data.expected_result: The link should send without showing any kind of progress bar
data.short_description: If you share a link (or anything without file) to a DM using Incoming Share, a file upload progress bar will appear indefinitely
data.steps_to_repro: - Open YouTube - Find a video - Share to Discord - Select a DM - Send
